rooms.description: A spacious living area with open layout, incorporating traditional Kerala-style wooden beams and terracotta tiles. Provides natural light through large openings.
Well-equipped kitchen designed in a modern yet traditional style, integrating local materials and efficient workflow while respecting Vastu principles for fire element balance.
A guest room featuring Kerala-style detailing with adequate ventilation and natural light. Adheres to Vastu by ensuring a calm and inviting ambiance.
Largest bedroom with enhanced privacy, incorporating traditional elements like intricate carvings and local wood. Placement follows Vastu guidelines for the head of the household.
A comfortable bedroom designed with a blend of modern amenities and traditional Kerala aesthetics, ensuring peaceful sleep as per Vastu norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with the auspicious direction according to Vastu.
Large windows designed for maximum ventilation and natural light, keeping in mind traditional Kerala aesthetics.
Open door to the central courtyard leading to the garden area.

courtyard.description: A central open space designed as a courtyard that promotes natural light and ventilation. It serves as an extension of living space and connects with the large garden area outside.

garden.description: Expansive garden complementing the Nalukettu design, providing serene outdoor space for relaxation.
